long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The fastest and easiest way to shorten URLs using the TinyURL API. Click the icon to shorten the current page URL, generate a QR Code, or input your own URL to shorten.

‚û°Ô∏è Do you want to use this easy-to-use URL Shortener in any Chromium-based browser? Click "Install" to add the extension to your toolbar. This TinyURL-based URL Shortener is the perfect solution to those looking for a simple, easy-to-use web extension.

üîóSimply click the icon to automatically shorten the URL of your current webpage. This link can also be copied to your clipboard with the click of a button! If you want to shorten a different URL, feel free to input your own link in the text entry box and click submit to generate a new TinyURL link.

üì∑ New Feature: Generate QR Codes for any URL with a single click! Quickly create QR codes for easy sharing of URLs. This feature is perfect for sharing links in a more versatile and scannable format. The update also features a "Copy-to-Clipboard" button and a "Download PNG" button to help share your QR Code!

üåëNew Feature: Dark Mode! Enjoy a user-friendly interface with our new dark mode setting. This mode reduces eye strain, especially in low-light environments, providing a comfortable user experience for night-time browsing or for those who prefer a darker aesthetic. The application retains your preference for future usages!

üíª The extension runs on a very lightweight script saving resources and is not user-intensive for the CPU.

üîíThis extension does not save or maintain any account of links provided to ensure user privacy. Start using this extension today! Thank you for your support!
